title: Mobile Game 2 Leveled Up Sound Effects
description: Now it’s easy to reach the highest levels in professional gameplay sound and audio engagement. Mobile Game 2 – is a dynamic collection of 500 royalty free game sound effects inspired by top selling app-game hits.
longDescription:
Click HERE for Audio Demos

Click HERE for Youtube Demo

Mobile Game 2 – Leveled Up SFX is the all new and totally original creative companion to the #1 best selling game sound library – Mobile Game. Make a bold statement today and level up your audio production with Mobile Game 2 – Leveled up SFX.

Attention motion graphics people, game developers, app developers, creative remix engineers. It’s time to take advantage of the latest hot professional gameplay sound effects collection. We’ve done all the heavy lifting for you. Mobile Game 2 is easy to use by organizing sounds into gamer familiar categories. Plus, we include ample audio file metadata to help you find the right sounds fast. Sounds are pre-mixed and mastered and they’re instantly ready to use out of the box. That means you’ll save tons of health and power cycles before you need to recharge your audio creativity.


Like all the sound libraries from ESM, we save you literally thousands of dollars compared to trying to make these sounds on your own. Mobile Game 2 – Leveled Up SFX is a good deal. It’s easier than ever to add professionally produced sound effects to your important audio project. All designed to make your life easier and production workflow faster. Market leading quality and creativity are at your fingertips. An unquestionable value, Mobile Game 2 – Leveled Up SFX is ready.
technicalDetails:
Mobile Game 2 sound effects collection brings a versatile and wide ranging catalog of well liked app game styled sounds. Useful in animations, video games, arcades, casino games, and apps, Mobile Game 2 – sound library is great for rapid prototyping and iterative sound design. You’ll instantly gain professional results and get your projects done quickly and on time.

Features:

  • Inspired by Popular Best Selling App Games
  • App Game Sound Effects Library
  • 50 cooking & crafting – building tools, upgrades, position, success, inventory, opens, repair and more!
  • 90 game actions like cartoon catapult, acid trap, gas bubble, robot spawn, spike trap, wooden lever
  • 50 melodic stingers & stabs
  • 99 menu & UI/UX – tonal designed and organic FX
  • 50 musical motifs – defeat, victory, bonus, quest complete, logo splash screen, positive/negative notifications, and affirmations
  • 130 pick ups – items, health, box break, bonuses, coins, specials, tech collects, electrons, runes, potion, loot, jewel, bell, squish + many more
  • 70 power up and power downs – perfect for specials, buffs, booster, instant spells, and SFX

Number of Audio Waves: 539

Number of Audio Cues: 539

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: N/A

Minutes of audio provided: 17m

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
